property.name: listTitle
property.label: Title
property.description: Enter the title of the list

property.name: query
property.label: SOQL Query
property.description: Standard SOQL query, SELECT fields will be added as columns. Supports WHERE filters and references to current parent object by using '$record.FIELDNAME'. For example WHERE Id = $record.Id

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: Custom Column Labels
property.description: If you don't want standard column fields labels, enter labels for every field, separated by comma.

property.name: rowActions
property.label: Row Actions
property.description: Enter row actions separated by comma, standard ones are View, Edit and Delete

property.name: maxColumns
property.label: Max Columns
property.description: Max amount of columns displayed when not viewing all

property.name: maxRows
property.label: Max Rows
property.description: Max amount of rows displayed when not viewing all. It's recommended to use a lower number to reduce loading time

property.name: customIconName
property.label: Custom Icon
property.description: Enter the name of the icon. List of availble icons: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: showRowNumbers
property.label: Show Row Numbers
property.description: Select this checkbox if you want to display row numbers

property.name: limitedEditForm
property.label: Limited Edit Form
property.description: Select this checkbox if you want limited edit form view to the fields you select or full standard view

property.name: limitedNewForm
property.label: Limtied New Form
property.description: Select this checkbox if you want limited new form view to the fields you select or full standard view

property.name: recordTypeId
property.label: Default New RecordType Id
property.description: Enter the default Record Type Id for new records
